channel.title: CVE Feed for Peregrine themes -- Bloglo

item.title: CVE-2024-35715|2024-06-08T13:22:49.089Z -- peregrine%20themes -- bloglo
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Peregrine themes Bloglo allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Bloglo: from n/a through 1.1.3.
